Digital to Analog Air Compressor Conversion

Mechanical Design / 2025

About this Project

Problem: The digital controller on my familyâ€™s air compressor failed rendering the air compressor useless.

Solution: I replaced the digital control components with analog components and created a support for them. Seven years later, it still works perfectly.


Relevant Skills

  • CAD Modeling: Designed supports for analog components using FreeCAD
  • Systems Integration: Sourced and integrated pressure switch, regulator, tank pressure gauge and manifold into existing air compressor
